SELECT *, u.username, u.alias, u.avatar FROM bms_codepost t LEFT JOIN ums_user u ON t.user_id = u.id
and u.username = #{username} and t.was_reviewed = false and (t.original_post_id = '' or t.original_post_id is null)
order by t.view desc, t.create_time desc

SELECT *, u.username, u.alias, u.avatar FROM bms_codepost t LEFT JOIN ums_user u ON t.user_id = u.id
and u.username = #{username} and (t.original_post_id != '' or t.original_post_id is not null)
order by t.view desc, t.create_time desc
